name: Buggy Buddies
description:
Two bugs become unlikely friends when they are caught in a web

Download on Google Play :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GreenCoal.BuggyBuddies

Help them by running away from a hungry spider and collecting fruit on the way.

Avoid obstacles and make sure other insects don't get caught in the web!

  • Ladybug: slow and heavy
  • Fruit fly: fast and mobile 

Don't let both bugs get knocked out or the spider will catch you and the game is over!

How many points can you collect?

Created by: https://teamhelp.itch.io/
